title: Deep Learning in Production for Predicting Consumer Behavior
description: Our most recent product requires precise estimates of future interests of Zalando consumers based on their history of interacting with the fashion platform. For example, we want to predict a consumer's interest in ordering selected fashion articles. We set ourselves the goal to build a powerful and versatile prediction tool that not only fits the task at hand, but is also ready for future product developments.
description_lemmatized: recent product requires precise estimate future interest zalando consumer based history interacting fashion platform example want predict consumer interest ordering selected fashion article set goal build powerful versatile prediction tool fit task hand also ready future product development
